text: [Applause]
are you embarrassed to be asking for
another place well first of all obvious
I'm here with fellow leaders to talk
about the requests I've put in for a
short extension to article 50 and I know
many people be frustrated that the
summit is taking place at all because
the UK should have left the EU by now
and I greatly regret the fact that
Parliament is not being able to pass a
deal that would enable us to leave in a
smooth and orderly way but I am the
government continue to work to find a
way forward we've been talking with the
opposition and have been serious
constructive talks they will continue
tomorrow the purpose of this summit is
to win agree an extension which gives us
more time to agree a deal to enable us
to leave the EU in that smooth and
orderly way and what matters I think is
that I've asked for an extension to 30th
of June but what is important is that
any extension enables us to leave at the
point at which we ratify the withdrawal
agreement so he could leave on the 22nd
of May and start to build a brighter
future well I've been clear that the
UK's request is for the extension to the
30th of June I have been working to make
sure that we can leave the European
Union indeed we could have left the
European Union by now the Parliament
didn't pass the withdrawal agreement so
we need that extra time to work to
ensure that we can get a deal through
Parliament that enables us to leave in a
smooth and orderly way that's in
everybody's interest I think what
matters is that we are able to leave the
European Union at the point at which we
ratify that withdrawal agreement that
would enable us to leave by the 22nd of
May
the delay is not in your hands you've
served as Prime Minister he could not
countenance a delay beyond June the 30th
so I ask you again
what will you do if the EU insists on a
longer delay I'm working to ensure that
we can leave the European Union within
the timescale that the government wants
to see I want us to have to be able to
leave the European Union in smooth and
orderly way as soon as possible and
that's what I'm going to be working for
thank you
